dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Note-Taking Habits
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin take notes?

options.description: Your FarTwin will meticulously record every detail, including dates, times, and quotes.
Your FarTwin will summarize information in a concise manner, focusing on key points.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin handle conflicts?

options.description: Your FarTwin will assertively express their opinions and defend themselves, even in heated situations.
Your FarTwin will attempt to avoid conflict altogether, often at the expense of their own needs and desires.

dimensions.label: Analytical Approach
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin analyze information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will methodically and thoroughly examine data, searching for patterns and correlations.
Your FarTwin will glance at information briefly, making broad judgments without careful consideration.

dimensions.label: Reading Habits
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin approach reading?

options.description: Your FarTwin will meticulously read and analyze texts, taking detailed notes and underlining key points.
Your FarTwin will skim through materials quickly, focusing on surface-level information rather than in-depth analysis.

dimensions.label: Decision-Making Process
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will act on impulse, making quick and often impulsive decisions without careful consideration.
Your FarTwin will carefully weigh options and consider the pros and cons before making a decision.

dimensions.label: Social Interactions
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin interact with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will enthusiastically engage with people, forming strong connections and friendships.
Your FarTwin will be reserved and cautious in social situations, preferring to observe from a distance.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin manage their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will adapt to changing circumstances, often procrastinating or rushing through tasks.
Your FarTwin will create rigid schedules and deadlines, prioritizing efficiency and productivity.
